label: productionWasteInstructions
comment: Disposal instructions for the waste resulting from this production process.
Disposal instructions related to production waste for this agricultural crop production process.

rangeIncludes.comment: A set of instructions detailing how to properly dispose of a material.

domainIncludes.comment: A practice of cultivating land, raising crops, or treatment of the agricultural produce.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
